_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The practice of mindfulness of breathing: I’ll breathe in experiencing the whole body
I’ll breathe out experiencing the whole body
I’ll breathe in stilling physical processes
I’ll breathe out stilling physical processes
I’ll breathe in experiencing rapture
I’ll breathe out experiencing rapture
I’ll breathe in experiencing bliss
I’ll breathe out experiencing bliss
I’ll breathe in experiencing mental processes
I’ll breathe out experiencing mental processes
I’ll breathe in stilling mental processes
I’ll breathe out stilling mental processes
I’ll breathe in experiencing the mind
I’ll breathe out experiencing the mind
I’ll breathe in gladdening the mind
I’ll breathe out gladdening the mind
I’ll breathe in immersing the mind in samādhi
I’ll breathe out immersing the mind in samādhi
I’ll breathe in freeing the mind
I’ll breathe out freeing the mind
I’ll breathe in observing impermanence
I’ll breathe out observing impermanence
I’ll breathe in observing fading away
I’ll breathe out observing fading away
I’ll breathe in observing cessation
I’ll breathe out observing cessation
I’ll breathe in observing letting go
I’ll breathe out observing letting go
